title: Gospel Movie Extract 3 From "From the Throne Flows the Water of Life"

they only recognized Him gradually,

they not only refused to follow the Lord Jesus,

Almighty God's words reveal people so much.
Where Almighty God's work of the last days is concerned,

There is no middle way.
We can be clever virgins or foolish ones. It's up to us to choose.
